author: 0123456789 The Great
title: Transcending the Heavens, Altmile
text: |kana = てんげん ちょうこく アルト マイル |kana = てんげん ちょうこく アルト マイル Latest revision as of 10:29, January 7, 2017 Transcending the Heavens, Altmile If the heavens should stand in my way, I shall surpass the heavens. Card Effect(s) [ Stride ]-Stride Step-[Choose one or more cards with the sum of their grades being 3 or greater from your hand, and discard them] Stride this card on your (VC) from face down.[ACT](VC) [1/Turn] Generation Break 2 :[Counter Blast (1) & Choose a face down card from your G zone, and turn it face up] If you have a heart card with " Altmile " in its card name, this unit gets "[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, search your deck for up to one grade 2 card, call it to (RC), shuffle your deck, and that unit gets [Power]+5000 until end of turn." and "[CONT](VC):During your turn, all of the units in your front row get [Power]+2000 for each face up card named " Aerial Divine Knight, Altmile " in your G zone." . Tournament Status
